OOC: Well since I realized that Megan's gone to bed, and I got a
hankering to play.

BIC:
Megatron then notices Nightstrike in trouble in the air. He decides to
change target. He remembered this robot Nightstrike was fighting from
his database. The information he stole from Condor. He lifted off the
ground again, and flew towards them. "PROWL" he said with vile contempt.
He wondered if this was the same Military Strategist that he fought all
those millions of years ago, or would fight in the futur.
